TopicTitle: How do you install planet packs for kopernicus 1.11?

Articles.Content: I tried installing a kopernicus planet pack (I have kopernicus installed) but the game just infinitely loaded and loaded and i just ended the game in task managr but i think i just did something wrong BECAUSE THERE ARE LITERALLY NO INSTRUCTIONS ANYWHERE ON THE INTERNET ON HOW TO ACTUALLY INSTALL PLANET PACKS WITH KOPERNICUS so can anyone please tell me how to properly install planet packs for kopernicus?

A planet pack is not different from any other mod and there are plenty of instructions on installing mods... I even wrote one myself:

If you get stuck on a specific step or anything is unclear, I would be happy to help you further
